question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "It was further proposed in that a generalized duality between D dimensional geometry and D dimensional field theory may emerge in AdSD, black holes under a suitably defined extremal vanishing horizon EVH limit"?
answer: K. Goldstein, V. Jejjala, Y. Lei, S. van Leuven

question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "Conclusion and future work In this work, we systematically explore possible nearhorizon decoupled geometries in higherdimensional AdS black holes embedded in string theory and Mtheory"?
answer: M. J. Duff, TASI lectures on branes, black holes
